Posts.Content: Sep 3, 2010 03:37AM LIsaRay wrote: Hi - I was dx stage 2A in 2003, has mastectomy, ER+, HER2.  No chemo.  Dx stage IV in Dec 2005 - almost 5 years ago, w. mets to sternum and lungs.  Initial treatment was ovarian ablation with zoladex and zometa, later ovaries removed.  Relapsed at sternum in 2008, had local radiation and since then on Femara.  Happy to say still going strong. Have never had chemo.  Love to all LIsa
Posts.Title: WANTED: STAGE IV FIVE YEAR SURVIVORS! MCTHO eag1954

Posts.Content: Sep 3, 2010 03:39AM LIsaRay wrote: Yes - I am almost 5 years on hormonal treatment (removal of ovaries, then Femara) and zometa only. Lisa
